customer_name: Johnsons Corner Farm L L C
site_name: JOHNSONS CORNER FARM L L C

citations.narrative:
The exhibitor license for this facility was cancelled on 4 February 2015. Thirty-nine farm animals are currently being
exhibited at this facility. Any person operating or intending to operate as an exhibitor must have a valid license.
The facility must reapply and include any additional sites on the new application.
The exit briefing was conducted with the facility representative.
* The Regional office has mailed out a new prelicense package to the facility.
NO REGULATED ACTIVITIES MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL A USDA LICENSE IS OBTAINED.

narrative:
2.1(a)(1)
REQUIREMENTS AND APPLICATION.
The exhibitor license for this facility was cancelled on 4 February 2015.  Thirty-nine farm animals are currently being
exhibited at this facility.  Any person operating or intending to operate as an exhibitor must have a valid license.
The facility must reapply and include any additional sites on the new application.       
The exit briefing was conducted with the facility representative.
* The Regional office has mailed out a new prelicense package to the facility.
NO REGULATED ACTIVITIES MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL A USDA LICENSE IS OBTAINED.
